Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and address any urgent matters. Review the progress made throughout the week.
Finalize the templates for preliminary financial statements. Incorporate any feedback received and ensure all calculations are accurate.

Prepare a summary report outlining the progress made on each of the week's goals: establishing accounting policies, setting up systems for tracking performance and expenses, and preparing preliminary financial statements.
Email the summary report to @PM-1, @COO-1, and @CIO-1. Highlight any key accomplishments, challenges encountered, and next steps. Subject: Week 3 Progress Report - Fund Accounting.
Review and update the plan for setting up the selected accounting system based on any new information or insights gained during the week.
Continue reviewing the accounting policies and procedures document. Proofread for errors and inconsistencies and send out for final review.
Start thinking about tasks for the coming week. Start with light planning for those tasks.
Complete end-of-week tasks such as filing, backing up data, and organizing the workspace. Prepare to leave.
